sentences.en: A high proportion of the new arrivals are skilled professionals.
sentences.cn: 新来的人中很大一部分是技术熟练的专业人士。

sentences.en: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.cn: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.en: A substantial proportion of the population speak a French-based patois.
sentences.cn: 人口中有一大部分说以法语为基础的混合语。

sentences.en: Builders must learn about scale and proportion.
sentences.cn: 建筑师必须学习比例和均衡。

sentences.en: Everything just got blown out of proportion.
sentences.cn: 所有一切都变得不可收拾了。

sentences.en: His head is out of proportion to the size of his body.
sentences.cn: 他的头部与身体大小不成比例.

sentences.en: The media may be blowing it up out of proportion.
sentences.cn: 媒体可能过分夸大了此事。

sentences.en: the pension was docked &B{in proportion to} earnings.
sentences.cn: 养老金是按照收入比例扣除的。

sentences.en: The proportion of women in middle management has risen to 40%.
sentences.cn: 中层管理人员中女性所占比例已经上升至40%。

sentences.en: The proportion of women in the profession had risen to 17.3%.
sentences.cn: 从事该职业的女性比例已升高到17.3%。

sentences.en: The radio station has to include a substantial proportion of classical music.
sentences.cn: 该电台不得不播放大量的古典音乐。

sentences.en: The railways will carry a far higher proportion of freight traffic.
sentences.cn: 铁路将承担比例高得多的货运量。

sentences.en: the sculpture seemed &B{out of proportion to} its surroundings.
sentences.cn: 这座雕塑似乎与周围环境不相称。

sentences.en: uilders must learn about scale and proportion.
sentences.cn: 建筑师必须学习比例和均衡。

sentences.en: Water covers a large proportion of the earth's surface.
sentences.cn: 水覆盖了地球表面的大部分。

sentences.en: We must keep a sense of proportion about all this.
sentences.cn: 我们对所有的这些都要有轻重缓急之分。

sentences.en: We must not lose our sense of proportion.
sentences.cn: 我们不能丧失主次观念。

sentences.en: We've got to keep this in proportion.
sentences.cn: 我们应当正确对待这一点。

sentences.en: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.cn: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

sentences.en: When you're angry you don't always see things in proportion.
sentences.cn: 人生气时往往不按情理看事情.

sentences.en: Women's bodies tend to have a higher proportion of fat to water.
sentences.cn: 女性的身体内脂肪与水分的比例往往更高。

words.tran_cn: 成比例的；相称的；均衡的
比例的，成比例的；相称的，均衡的
成比例的；相称的；适当的
成比例地；相称地，适当地

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 按…比例；依…程度而变
（与他物的大小、形状、位置的关系）不成比例；不相称
区别轻重缓急的能力；分寸感；主次观念

trans.tran_cn: 部分，份额，比例，重要性，均衡
trans.tran_en: A proportion of a group or an amount is a part of it
to put something in a particular relationship with something else according to their relative size, amount, position etc
